editor-settings.use-in-app-clipboard.zh: 使用应用内剪贴板 (避免权限访问请求)

start-page-settings.show-start-page.en: Show the Start Page on startup

start-page-settings.auto-hide-start-page.zh: 打开项目后隐藏起始页
start-page-settings.auto-hide-start-page.en: Hide the Start Page when opening a project

developer-mode-confirmation.message.zh: 您正在尝试开启开发者模式，这是专门为插件开发者所设计的模式，不应该被普通用户使用。确定要在设置中显示开发模式选项的吗?
developer-mode-confirmation.message.en: Developer mode is intended for addon developers and should not be used by other users. Are you sure you want to show developer mode settings?

editor-settings.cache-cloud-meta.zh: 缓存云端数据 (减少网络请求)

simplified-mode-notification.zh: 注意，简化的用户界面将隐藏大部分Construct的功能，以使用户界面更简单。禁用此选项后，可恢复显示所有功能。
simplified-mode-notification.en: Note the simplified user interface has been enabled. This will hide many features of Construct in order to make the user interface simpler. Disable the setting to restore access to the full features of Construct.

update-settings.beta-description.zh: 选择测试版会收到更频繁的版本推送，适合喜欢尝鲜并愿意积极反馈问题的用户。需注意，测试版尚未经过测试，并且每次更新不一定有新功能尝试，还可能随时发生未知错误，导致编辑器崩溃闪退等现象。请避免在您的正式项目使用测试版。
update-settings.beta-description.en: Opt in to beta releases to get more frequent updates and try new features sooner. However beta releases have not had as much testing and may have more bugs.

advanced-settings.show-in-progress-langu.zh: 显示测试阶段的语言选项

in-progress-languages-notification.zh: 请注意，测试阶段的翻译语言没有被正式发布，不能保证测试阶段的翻译内容是合适或适当的。提供这个选项仅为了帮助翻译人员检查他们的工作。
in-progress-languages-notification.en: Please note that in-progress translations have not been reviewed. This option is intended to help translators review their work. There is no guarantee that the content of in-progress translations is suitable or appropriate.

event-sheet-settings.translate-expressio.zh: 翻译表达式（禁用则保留英文名称，但显示中文描述）
event-sheet-settings.translate-expressio.en: Translate expressions (uncheck to always show expressions in English)

editor-settings.simplified-mode.zh: 简单模式 (隐藏高级功能)
editor-settings.simplified-mode.en: Use simplified user interface (hides advanced features)

editor-settings.download-browser-saves-f.zh: 下载本地浏览器保存数据失败
editor-settings.download-browser-saves-f.en: Failed to download local browser saves

start-page-settings.show-start-page-mess.zh: 允许偶尔在 '起始页' 上显示来自 Construct 团队的消息横幅
start-page-settings.show-start-page-mess.en: Occasionally show message banners from the Construct team on the Start Page

backup-settings.local-backup-folder.need.zh: 需要选择一个本地文件夹，作为本地备份的路径。
backup-settings.local-backup-folder.need.en: The backup location needs a local backup folder to be chosen. Please pick one or select a different backup location.

advanced-settings.enable-experimental-fe.en: Enable experimental features (note: subject to change at any time)

editor-settings.show-take-a-break-remind.zh: 每隔 2 小时显示 '休息一下' 提醒
editor-settings.show-take-a-break-remind.en: Show 'take a break' reminder every 2 hours

restart-notification.message.zh: 重新启动 Construct 使更改生效。
restart-notification.message.en: Restart Construct for changes to take effect.

editor-settings.limit-to-webgl1.zh: 强制使用 WebGL 1（仅用于测试）
editor-settings.limit-to-webgl1.en: Limit editor/preview to WebGL 1 (for testing purposes)

update-settings.check-for-addon-updates.zh: 检查已安装的插件更新
update-settings.check-for-addon-updates.en: Check for updates for installed addons

editor-settings.reset-user-interface.con.zh: 用户界面已恢复到默认状态，重启 Construct 生效。
editor-settings.reset-user-interface.con.en: The saved state of the user interface has been reset for all users on this device. Restart Construct to restore the default user interface.

description_en: The Settings dialog allows you to change various settings for the Construct 3 editor. It can be opened via the main menu . User interface Language Select the language for the editor interface. Construct 3 must be reloaded after changing this. UI mode Whether to use a desktop interface, a mobile interface , or automatically decide which to use (the default). This can be useful to force tablets with a mouse and keyboard attached in to desktop mode. Construct 3 must be reloaded after changing this.
